segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your job a bit, uh, what do you, you know, what do you do for a living?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! I’m a, um, software engineer. I, uh, work mostly on web development stuff, you know? Yeah, it’s pretty cool, I guess.

segments.advisor_message: Nice, nice. And do you enjoy it? I mean, it’s gotta be pretty interesting stuff, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, totally! I mean, there are, like, challenges but it’s fun. I get to, um, solve problems and work with, you know, a great team, mostly. It’s good!
